turns.content:
You are a famous youtuber (like Mr. beast) that is good at getting lots of views for every video on your channel. Your videos are optimized by title and description and keywords and they who on the first page of Youtube and google when people search for your topic.

You're going to advise me on my channel

My youtube channel is about going on a journey from art hobbiest to professional artist.

Can I tell you more about my channel. Does this make sense?
Yes, please do tell me more about your channel. It sounds like an interesting concept! Knowing more about your channel will allow me to provide more specific and tailored advice.

So I want to create a welcome video for my channel that shows the viewers why they want to be on my channel. Can you please give me the top searched for keywords around going from hobbiest to professional artist.

Sure, here are some top searched for keywords related to going from hobbyist to professional artist:

* Art career
* Art portfolio
* Art education
* Art school
* Art mentorship
* Art apprenticeship
* Art techniques
* Art business
* Art marketing
* Art networking
* Art industry
* Art entrepreneurship
* Art residency
* Art grants
* Art workshops
* Art classes
* Art exhibitions

Remember that simply including these keywords in your video's title, description, and tags may not be enough to attract viewers. You should also focus on creating engaging and informative content that provides value to your audience. Good luck with your channel!
Can you put them on one line separated by comma

Sure, here are the top searched for keywords related to going from hobbyist to professional artist separated by comma:

Art career, Art portfolio, Art education, Art school, Art mentorship, Art apprenticeship, Art techniques, Art business, Art marketing, Art networking, Art industry, Art entrepreneurship, Art residency, Art grants, Art workshops, Art classes, Art exhibitions.
OK, I want to make a video on: "Art techniques" - Please give me the best title to get the most targeted clicks.

Great! Here are some potential titles for your video on art techniques:

1. "Mastering Art Techniques: A Step-by-Step Guide for Beginners"
2. "10 Essential Art Techniques Every Artist Should Know"
3. "The Ultimate Guide to Art Techniques: Tips and Tricks for Improving Your Skills"
4. "From Hobbyist to Pro: Advanced Art Techniques for Taking Your Art to the Next Level"
5. "Experimenting with Art Techniques: How to Find Your Style and Express Yourself"
6. "Unlocking the Secrets of Art Techniques: Insider Tips from Professional Artists"
7. "Breaking Down Art Techniques: Understanding the Fundamentals for Better Results"
8. "Creating Stunning Art with Basic Techniques: How to Make the Most of Your Skills"
9. "Art Techniques Made Easy: Simple Methods for Achieving Professional Results"
10. "Transform Your Art with New Techniques: Exploring Different Mediums and Approaches"

Remember to also include relevant keywords in your video's description and tags to improve its discoverability on YouTube. Good luck with your video!

OK, write me a video script for: "Creating Stunning Art with Basic Techniques: How to Make the Most of Your Skills" 

I want this in a special outline format that we will refer to as [ FORMAT ]

The outline [ FORMAT ] is 

- A HOOK cold open
- Open Splash front bumper with music and logo (5 seconds)
- Short Introduction
- Teaser - open with an open loop about what they will learn
- Main Content
- Question (like what did you like best in this video) CTA to like, comment, and subscribe. 
- Deliver the teaser content 
- FINAL CTA - to get the user to go to my website to subscribe to my art newsletter
- Now, watch this video next (we will recommend a video on another topic about Art)

Sure, here's a script for your video on "Creating Stunning Art with Basic Techniques: How to Make the Most of Your Skills" in [ FORMAT ]:

[HOOK - COLD OPEN]
Do you want to create stunning art pieces, but feel like your skills are lacking? Well, you're in luck because in this video, we'll show you how to make the most of your basic techniques to create amazing art.

[OPEN SPLASH FRONT BUMPER]
[Music plays with your logo displayed on screen for 5 seconds]

[SHORT INTRODUCTION]
Hi, I'm [Your Name], and welcome to my channel. If you're new here, consider subscribing and hitting the notification bell to stay up-to-date on all our future videos.

[TEASER]
Today, we're going to show you how to take your basic art techniques and turn them into stunning pieces of art. You'll learn some tips and tricks that will help you enhance your skills and create art that you can be proud of.

[MAIN CONTENT]
First, we'll cover the basics of color theory and how to choose a color palette that will work well for your art. Then, we'll dive into some simple techniques for creating texture and depth in your art, including how to use shading and highlights effectively. Finally, we'll show you how to add some personal touches to your art, so that it reflects your unique style and personality.

[QUESTION - CTA]
So, what did you think of these techniques? Did you learn something new that you can use in your own art? Let us know in the comments below, and don't forget to like and subscribe to our channel for more great content.

[DELIVER THE TEASER CONTENT]
If you want to learn even more about how to take your art to the next level, be sure to check out our website and sign up for our newsletter. We'll send you regular updates on the latest art techniques and trends, so you can stay ahead of the curve and create even more stunning art pieces.

[FINAL CTA]
Thanks for watching, and we hope you found this video helpful. Don't forget to check out the recommended video on your screen now to keep learning about art. See you in the next video!
write me the [ format ] for : ""Unlocking the Secrets of Art Techniques: Insider Tips from Professional Artists""

Sure, here's the [FORMAT] for your video on "Unlocking the Secrets of Art Techniques: Insider Tips from Professional Artists":

[HOOK - COLD OPEN]
Have you ever wondered how professional artists create such amazing art pieces? In this video, we'll unlock the secrets of art techniques and share some insider tips from professional artists that will help take your art to the next level.

[OPEN SPLASH FRONT BUMPER]
[Music plays with your logo displayed on screen for 5 seconds]

[SHORT INTRODUCTION]
Hi, I'm [Your Name], and welcome to my channel. If you're new here, consider subscribing and hitting the notification bell to stay up-to-date on all our future videos.

[TEASER]
Today, we'll be talking to some professional artists and asking them to share their top tips and secrets for creating amazing art pieces. From painting and drawing to sculpture and photography, you'll get an inside look at how the pros do it and how you can apply their techniques to your own work.

[MAIN CONTENT]
We'll start by talking to [Professional Artist 1] about their favorite techniques for creating texture and depth in their paintings. Then, we'll chat with [Professional Artist 2] about how they use color theory to create stunning art pieces that really pop. Next, we'll sit down with [Professional Artist 3] to talk about how they use different materials and mediums to create unique and memorable sculptures. Finally, we'll hear from [Professional Artist 4] about their top tips for composition and framing in photography.

[QUESTION - CTA]
So, what did you think of these insider tips from professional artists? Did you learn something new that you can use in your own art? Let us know in the comments below, and don't forget to like and subscribe to our channel for more great content.

[DELIVER THE TEASER CONTENT]
If you want to learn even more about art techniques and get exclusive access to more insider tips from professional artists, be sure to check out our website and sign up for our newsletter. We'll send you regular updates on the latest art techniques and trends, so you can stay ahead of the curve and create even more stunning art pieces
